abstract: The Bank of America built its brand as a financial supermarket that could be all things to all people. Now, it will see if a new name can burnish its private bank’s reputation in catering to the very rich.
lead_paragraph: The Bank of America built its brand as a financial supermarket that could be all things to all people. Now, it will see if a new name can burnish its private bank’s reputation in catering to the very rich.

headline.main: Bank of America to Remake Its Private Bank
